contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name = Rosanna | type = | style = Melbourne | image = Rosanna Station2.jpg | image_caption = Looking towards platform 1 and away from the city | address = | country = | coordinates = {{coord|-37.7429|145.0662|format=dms|type:railwaystation_region:AU-VIC|display=inline,title}} | line = <!-- line information is detailed under "services" --> | other = | structure = | platform = 2 | depth = | levels = | tracks = 2 | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = ROS | owned = [[VicTrack]] | operator = | zone = | smartcardname = [[Myki]] zone | smartcardstatus = <span style="color:blue;">2</span> | status = Manned | former = | passengers = | pass_year = | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{s-rail|title=Metro Trains}} {{s-line|system=Victoria|line=Hurstbridge|previous=Heidelberg |next=Macleod }} | map_locator = [http://maps.google.com/maps?ie=UTF8&om=1&z=16&ll=-37.742926,145.066159&spn=0.012573,0.019956 Link] | Melway = [http://www.street-directory.com.au/sd3/map.php?x=145.06628921084734&y=-37.74325186529701&l=13&mt=4 Link] | web = [http://www.metlinkmelbourne.com.au/stop/view/19936 Link, includes timetables] }} '''Rosanna''' is a [[railway station]] in [[Melbourne]], [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], [[Australia]], located in the suburb of [[Rosanna, Victoria|Rosanna]], on the [[Hurstbridge railway line]]. Rosanna is manned Monday-Friday between 7:30am and 9:30am and is in [[Metcard]] <span style="color:blue;">Zone 2</span>. ==Facilities== Rosanna is located at the southern end of the Lower Plenty Road level crossing, with station access from Turnham Avenue, Beetham Parade and Lower Plenty Road. The station consists of two [[side platforms]]; Platform 1 has a large [[fibro]] building, while platform 2 has a smaller fibro building. A large [[Metcard]] ticket vending machine is located at the entrance to platform 1, which is able to dispense most ticketing options available and also accept notes and coins. A small coin-only Metcard ticket vending machine is located at the entrance to platform 2, as well as at the entrance to platform 1. Between Rosanna and [[Heidelberg railway station|Heidelberg station]] the line is [[Single track (rail)|single track]], and passes under a hill by a short tunnel. This arrangement results in delays to trains during busy periods as only one train can occupy the section at one time. ==Platforms, services and connecting bus services== '''Platform 1:''' *'''[[Hurstbridge railway line|Hurstbridge line]]''' - all stations and limited stops services to [[Flinders Street Station|Flinders Street]] '''Platform 2:''' *'''[[Hurstbridge railway line|Hurstbridge line]]''' - all stations services to [[Macleod railway station|Macleod]], [[Greensborough railway station|Greensborough]], [[Eltham railway station, Melbourne|Eltham]] and [[Hurstbridge railway station|Hurstbridge]] *'''513''' [[Eltham, Victoria|Eltham]] – [[Glenroy, Victoria|Glenroy]] via Greensborough RS, Watsonia RS, Rosanna RS, Coburg RS (every day). Operated by [[Dyson's Bus Services]]. *'''517''' [[Northland Shopping Centre|Northland SC]] – [[St Helena, Victoria|St Helena]] via Rosanna RS, Greensborough Plaza SC, Greensborough RS (every day). Operated by [[Dyson's Bus Services]]. ==History== Rosanna station opened on 1 October 1927.<ref>[http://www.vicsig.net/index.php?page=infrastructure&name=Rosanna VICSIG Infrastructure - Rosanna]</ref> Boom barriers were provided at Lower Plenty Road in 1972.<ref name=aw>{{cite web |url=http://www.vicsig.net/index.php?page=infrastructure&pcr=S0158 |title=VICSIG Infrastructure |publisher=www.vicsig.net/index.php |author= |accessdate=2009-02-26 }}</ref> The station buildings were reconstructed in 1975.<ref name=vicrail6283>{{cite book | author = Vincent Adams Winter | title = VR and VicRail: 1962 - 1983 | year = 1990 | isbn = 0-9592069-3-0 <!-- This is a corrected ISBN and may not match the number printed in the book. --> | page = 106 }}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category-inline|Rosanna railway station, Melbourne}} [[Category:Railway stations in Melbourne]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1927]] {{Melbourne-rail-stub}}
